name: Sack Lunch: Heidi Swanson's Lemon-Scented Quinoa Salad
description: Photograph taken by Heidi Swanson Though I am always looking for new ways to eat quinoa, Heidi Swanson’s lemon-scented quinoa salad from 101 Cookbooks never loses its place in my rotation. It comes together in a flash, it’s healthy and...
